com.brightcove.drm.widevine

Class RemoveAllRightsTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer>
      • com.brightcove.drm.widevine.RemoveAllRightsTask

  • public class RemoveAllRightsTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Integer>
    This class removes rights for all rights-protected Sources managed by the DrmManagerClient. This task should be executed, for example, when a user signs out of a service. This is an asynchronous task. The result of the request will be retrieved from either the onEventListener or onErrorListener handler. On success the onEventListener will emit a DrmEvent.TYPE_ALL_RIGHTS_REMOVED. On failure the onErrorListener will emit a DrmErrorEvent.TYPE_REMOVE_ALL_RIGHTS_FAILED. Example usage 
     mDrmManagerClient.setOnEventListener(new DrmManagerClient.OnEventListener() {
     public void onEvent(DrmManagerClient drmManagerClient, DrmEvent event) {
         if (event.getType() == DrmEvent.TYPE_ALL_RIGHTS_REMOVED) {
             // removed all rights
         }
      }
 });
 mDrmManagerClient.setOnErrorListener(new DrmMangerClient.OnErrorListener() {
     public void onError(DrmManagerClient drmManagerClient, DrmErrorEvent event) {
         if (event.getType() == DrmErrorEvent.TYPE_REMOVE_ALL_RIGHTS_FAILED) {
             // failed to remove all rights
         }
     }
 });
 AsyncTask<Void, Void, Integer> task = new RemoveAllRightsTask(mDrmManagerClient);
 task.execute();
